value.title: 2 ways to rotate Power BI tabs
value.excerpt: If you want to show your power bi report on a TV or web browser and have the tabs rotate at a interval you specify, this video is for you. I will show you two ways to do that. value.title: 8 common column headers transformations you will need in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todays video, I will show you 8 common column header transformations that you will probably need to do in Power Query. Looking for a specific one?
